languages.text: {n}Консоль управления маршрутами бесстрастно взирает на бойню, разворачивающуюся на путях. Издалека слышен шум приближающегося состава — одной командой вы можете перевести железнодорожную стрелку и направить его прямым курсом в гущу битвы, лишив жизни как ваших подданных, так и ксеносских отродий.{/n}

{n}The route control console stares dispassionately at the carnage unfolding on the tracks. The sounds of an approaching train ring in the distance. With a single command, you could divert the train and send it straight into the thick of the battle, ending the lives of both the xenos spawn and your subjects.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Консоль управления маршрутами бесстрастно взирает на бойню, разворачивающуюся на путях. Издалека слышен шум приближающегося состава — одной командой вы можете перевести железнодорожную стрелку и направить его прямым курсом в гущу битвы, лишив жизни как ваших подданных, так и ксеносских отродий.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The route control console stares dispassionately at the carnage unfolding on the tracks. The sound of an approaching train can be heard in the distance. With a single command, you can turn the switch and send it straight into the thick of battle, taking the lives of both your subjects and the xenos spawn.{/n}

{n}The route control console stares dispassionately at the carnage unfolding on the tracks. The sound of an approaching train can be heard in the distance. With a single command, you can turn the switch and send it straight into the thick of battle, taking the lives of both your subjects and the xenos spawn.{/n}

{n}The route-control console stares dispassionately at the carnage unfolding on the tracks. The sounds of an approaching train ring in the distance. With a single command, you could flip the switch and send it straight into the thick of the battle, ending the lives of both the xenos spawn and your subjects.{/n}

{n}The route-control console stares dispassionately at the carnage unfolding on the tracks. The sounds of an approaching train ring in the distance. With a single command, you could flip the switch and send it straight into the thick of the battle, ending the lives of both the xenos spawn and your subjects.{/n}

{n}The route control console stares dispassionately at the carnage unfolding on the tracks. The sounds of an approaching train ring in the distance. With a single command, you could divert the train and send it straight into the thick of the battle, ending the lives of both the xenos spawn and your subjects.{/n}

{n}The route control console stares dispassionately at the carnage unfolding on the tracks. The sounds of an approaching train ring in the distance. With a single command, you could divert the train and send it straight into the thick of the battle, ending the lives of both the xenos spawn and your subjects.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La consola de control de ruta observa con indiferencia la masacre que se desarrolla en las vías. En la distancia, resuenan los ruidos que anuncian la llegada del tren. Con una sola orden, podrías cambiar su dirección y enviarlo al corazón de la batalla, acabando tanto con los engendros xenos como con tus súbditos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The route control console stares dispassionately at the carnage unfolding on the tracks. The sounds of an approaching train ring in the distance. With a single command, you could divert the train and send it straight into the thick of the battle, ending the lives of both the xenos spawn and your subjects.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La consola de control de ruta observa con indiferencia la masacre que se desarrolla en las vías. En la distancia, resuenan los ruidos que anuncian la llegada del tren. Con una sola orden, podrías cambiar su dirección y enviarlo al corazón de la batalla, acabando tanto con los engendros xenos como con tus súbditos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}経路制御操作盤は、線路の上で繰り広げられる殺戮を冷静に見つめている。列車が近づいてくる音が遠くから響く。コマンドひとつで列車を迂回させ、そのまま戦闘の渦に送り込み、異種族と自分の家臣の命を奪うことができてしまう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The route control console stares dispassionately at the carnage unfolding on the tracks. The sounds of an approaching train ring in the distance. With a single command, you could divert the train and send it straight into the thick of the battle, ending the lives of both the xenos spawn and your subjects.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}経路制御操作盤は、線路の上で繰り広げられる殺戮を冷静に見つめている。列車が近づいてくる音が遠くから響く。コマンドひとつで列車を迂回させ、そのまま戦闘の渦に送り込み、異種族と自分の家臣の命を奪うことができてしまう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}路线控制终端就摆在你眼前，不远处的铁轨处正在爆发激烈的战斗，列车驶近的声音从远方传来。只要一个命令，你就可以改变列车的行驶路线，让它直接冲入战场中心，把那些异形和你的臣民统统杀光。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The route control console stares dispassionately at the carnage unfolding on the tracks. The sounds of an approaching train ring in the distance. With a single command, you could divert the train and send it straight into the thick of the battle, ending the lives of both the xenos spawn and your subjects.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}路线控制终端就摆在你眼前，不远处的铁轨处正在爆发激烈的战斗，列车驶近的声音从远方传来。只要一个命令，你就可以改变列车的行驶路线，让它直接冲入战场中心，把那些异形和你的臣民统统杀光。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Streckenkontrollkonsole starrt leidenschaftslos auf das Blutbad, das sich auf den Schienen abspielt. Das Geräusch eines nahenden Zugs ist in der Ferne zu hören. Mit einem einzigen Befehl könntest du den Zug umleiten und mitten in die Schlacht schicken, womit du sowohl die Xenos-Brut als auch deine Untertanen dem Untergang weihen würdest.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The route control console stares dispassionately at the carnage unfolding on the tracks. The sounds of an approaching train ring in the distance. With a single command, you could divert the train and send it straight into the thick of the battle, ending the lives of both the xenos spawn and your subjects.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Streckenkontrollkonsole starrt leidenschaftslos auf das Blutbad, das sich auf den Schienen abspielt. Das Geräusch eines nahenden Zugs ist in der Ferne zu hören. Mit einem einzigen Befehl könntest du den Zug umleiten und mitten in die Schlacht schicken, womit du sowohl die Xenos-Brut als auch deine Untertanen dem Untergang weihen würdest.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La console de commande des rails domine froidement le carnage tandis qu'au loin résonne le bruit d'un train en approche. D'une simple commande, vous pourriez détourner le train et l'envoyer faucher aussi bien l'engeance xénos que vos propres sujets.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The route control console stares dispassionately at the carnage unfolding on the tracks. The sounds of an approaching train ring in the distance. With a single command, you could divert the train and send it straight into the thick of the battle, ending the lives of both the xenos spawn and your subjects.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La console de commande des rails domine froidement le carnage tandis qu'au loin résonne le bruit d'un train en approche. D'une simple commande, vous pourriez détourner le train et l'envoyer faucher aussi bien l'engeance xénos que vos propres sujets.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Rota ayarlama konsolu, raylardaki katliama duygusuzca bakıyor. Yaklaşan bir trenin sesi uzaklardan geliyor. Tek bir hamlenle trenin yönünü değiştirip muharebenin ortasına dalmasını sağlayabilir ve hem zenoların hem de kendi hizmetkârlarının ölümüne yol açabilirsin.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The route control console stares dispassionately at the carnage unfolding on the tracks. The sounds of an approaching train ring in the distance. With a single command, you could divert the train and send it straight into the thick of the battle, ending the lives of both the xenos spawn and your subjects.{/n}
